author: ianna
body:
* Integrate detailed cavern description in 2023D12 scenario
* Add 24634.0 relval workflow to test it
* Correct exception message from DDG4Builder
*  Remove ZDC xml description - the geometry builder does not use it any way

Next steps are to make sure there are no overlaps since the MUON and its child volumes are different from 2017. The fix will come as a separate PR.

@kpedro88, @calabria, @pietverwilligen - FYI
title: 2023 Scenario and Workflow with Detailed Cavern
